name: Echoes in White
description: Echoes in White – a Relaxation Music Experience from MAGIC HORIZONSEscape from the ”mental hamster wheel” and leave behind every day stress.Dive into the fantastic visual worlds of Space and the Green Oasis combined with magic binaural electronic and world ethno music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1060 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1070 Storage: 6 GB available space
